Package com.woinject

This package contains all the base classes related to WOInject core features.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    InjectableApplication
    The InjectableApplication class is an extension of the ERXApplication that adds support for dependency injection to WebObjects applications.
    WOInject
    The WOInject class initializes the application intercepting core methods used by WebObjects classes to create objects.
    WOInjectModule
    This class contains the basic WOInject configuration and auxiliary providers.
    WOScopes
    WebObjects scopes.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    WOInjectException
    General exception for WOInject problems.
  • Annotation Types Summary 
    Annotation Type Description
    Current
    Apply this annotation to inject the current WOsession and WOContext.
    WORequestScoped
    Apply this to implementation classes when you want one instance per request.
    WOSessionScoped
    Apply this to implementation classes when you want one instance per session.

Package com.woinject Description

This package contains all the base classes related to WOInject core features.
Since:
1.0
